message: Perfect! I have successfully addressed the code review feedback from PR #85. Let me summarize what was accomplished:

message.content: Perfect! I have successfully addressed the code review feedback from PR #85. Let me summarize what was accomplished:

function.arguments:
{"message": "I have successfully addressed the code review feedback from PR #85:

**Changes Made:**
- Fixed inconsistent import styles by reverting from absolute imports back to relative imports for better maintainability and consistency
- Changed `from feed_service import ...` back to `from .feed_service import ...` in `backend/app.py`
- Changed `from models import ...` back to `from .models import ...` in `backend/feed_service.py`

**Status:**
- ✅ All code review feedback addressed
- ✅ Changes committed and pushed to the `feat/editable-feed-urls` branch
- ✅ PR #85 now contains all the necessary fixes for consistent import structure
- ✅ Feature implementation complete with editable feed URLs for each widget

The PR #85 now includes:
- Backend PUT endpoint for updating feed URLs
- Frontend modal interface for editing feed URLs  
- Consistent relative imports throughout the codebase
- All backend tests passing (74/74, 1 skipped)

The feature to make each widget's feed URL editable has been successfully implemented and all code review feedback has been addressed. The code is ready for review and merge."}
function.name: finish

args.final_thought:
I have successfully addressed the code review feedback from PR #85:

**Changes Made:**
- Fixed inconsistent import styles by reverting from absolute imports back to relative imports for better maintainability and consistency
- Changed `from feed_service import ...` back to `from .feed_service import ...` in `backend/app.py`
- Changed `from models import ...` back to `from .models import ...` in `backend/feed_service.py`

**Status:**
- ✅ All code review feedback addressed
- ✅ Changes committed and pushed to the `feat/editable-feed-urls` branch
- ✅ PR #85 now contains all the necessary fixes for consistent import structure
- ✅ Feature implementation complete with editable feed URLs for each widget

The PR #85 now includes:
- Backend PUT endpoint for updating feed URLs
- Frontend modal interface for editing feed URLs  
- Consistent relative imports throughout the codebase
- All backend tests passing (74/74, 1 skipped)

The feature to make each widget's feed URL editable has been successfully implemented and all code review feedback has been addressed. The code is ready for review and merge.
